source: TEXT_HEAVNR204_02252_SEQ_00<tab>In the absence of a better option, Backrix seems ready to go along with Mide's rescue plan.
target: TEXT_HEAVNR204_02252_SEQ_00<tab>Rückblix ist mit Mides Plan im Großen und Ganzen einverstanden.

source: TEXT_HEAVNR204_02252_SEQ_01<tab>Though Backrix is troubled by Mide's bizarre belief that the soul of her beloved lives on in Alexander, he agrees to go along with the treasure hunter's plan for Roundrox's sake. However, he warns you that the Illuminati have been tirelessly ferrying supplies to their sunken home, likely for use in new weapons. Be ready for anything as you attempt to break through the Illuminati's last line of defense on your way to the second core.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR204_02252_SEQ_01<tab>Ihr werdet in „Alexander - Last des Sohnes“ einsteigen, um den Kern abzustellen, der den Bezirk Midas mit Energie versorgt. Bereite dich gut vor!

※ Kann über die Inhaltssuche oder über <var 32 ((EObj)) 03F61E9F52020502 /var> an der Luke im Thaliak betreten werden.

source: TEXT_HEAVNR204_02252_SEQ_02<tab>Despite the best efforts of the Illuminati's foremost machinists, the path to the core of Midas is now free from obstruction. Press on to your destination.
target: TEXT_HEAVNR204_02252_SEQ_02<tab>Du hast „Alexander - Last des Sohnes“ erobert. Kehr zurück.

source:
TEXT_HEAVNR204_02252_SEQ_03<tab>You push through to the heart of Midas, and Mide quickly disables the core powering Alexander's left arm. Before you have time to savor your victory, however, Quickthinx Allthoughts appears on a hovering platform, flanked by a group of underlings. The Illuminati Grand Master duly indulges in his characteristic cryptic remarks, before declaring that he knows exactly who holds the true codex fragment. Though Wedge and Biggs make a valiant effort to divert the goblins' attention while you escape with Mide, their plan comes to naught when the moving platform on which you are standing stops without warning, catapulting the codex fragment out of the treasure hunter's grasp. With grim inevitability, it lands on Quickthinx's still-functioning platform, and he gleefully departs the scene.

You return to Bigwest Shortstop in low spirits, but take solace in the fact that two of Alexander's cores have now been disabled, ensuring that the primal will remain immobile. Backrix, however, seems nonplussed by your return. Speak with the confused goblin, and inquire as to the cause of his unease.
target: TEXT_HEAVNR204_02252_SEQ_03<tab>Du konntest mit Mides Hilfe auch den zweiten Kern abstellen. Aber Denkfix sieht auf unerklärliche Weise all eure Bewegungen voraus und nimmt euch das letzte Fragment des Enigma-Kodex ab! Berichte Rückblix in der Kurzrast vom unglücklichen Ausgang der Mission.

source: TEXT_HEAVNR204_02252_SEQ_04<tab>Backrix claims that not nearly enough time has elapsed for you to have completed your mission, given that you departed mere moments before returning. What could be the cause of this bizarre discrepancy? Could Backrix's heretofore steel-trap-like braincase be playing tricks on him...or is something more sinister afoot?
target: TEXT_HEAVNR204_02252_SEQ_04<tab>Rückblix ist verblüfft, euch jetzt schon wieder zurückkommen zu sehen. Irgendwas äußerst Seltsames scheint hier vorzugehen ...

source: TEXT_HEAVNR204_02252_TODO_00<tab>Enter the Burden of the Son.
TEXT_HEAVNR204_02252_TODO_01<tab>Enter the Burden of the Son.
TEXT_HEAVNR204_02252_BACKRIX_000_000<tab>Pssshkoh... Treasure hunter truly believes soul of lost love sleeps in metal giant... Madness. But Backrix does not doubt resolve to rescue Roundrox.
target: TEXT_HEAVNR204_02252_BACKRIX_000_000<tab>Psh, Mide hat Einbilden in Denkschale, dass Koloss früherer Liebter ist. Aber Rückblix ist selbe Meinung in Einepunkt: Muzzu Rundblox retten.

source: TEXT_HEAVNR204_02252_BACKRIX_000_001<tab>Go with Mide deep into Midas, and deactivate second core. But do not underestimate Illuminati! Day and night, they bring supplies into steel fortress─Backrix suspects Illuminati are tinkermaking new weapons!
target: TEXT_HEAVNR204_02252_BACKRIX_000_001<tab>Bringzzu Kern von Midas zu Stillstehen, kho? Aber Großwachsene<var 08 E905 (()) ((r)) /var> muss aufpassen, ist voll mit Sprengenstoff von Indigohand da drin.

source: TEXT_HEAVNR204_02252_SYSTEM_000_010<tab>You now have access to the Burden of the Son. Midas can be accessed via the entrance at the Thaliak River.
target: TEXT_HEAVNR204_02252_SYSTEM_000_010<tab>Du kannst nun „Alexander - Last des Sohnes“ über die Inhaltssuche oder über <var 32 ((EObj)) 03F61E9F52020502 /var> an der Luke im Thaliak betreten.

source: TEXT_HEAVNR204_02252_BIGGS_000_040<tab>They tell me the Illuminati have been up all hours ferrying raw materials to Alexander. Seems the thrashing you gave old Quickthinx didn't do much to dampen their spirits.
target: TEXT_HEAVNR204_02252_BIGGS_000_040<tab>Rückblix hat ja gesagt, dass die Indigohand schon länger Materialien und Sprengstoff in den Koloss karrt. Womöglich haben sie mehr Kapazitäten, als wir ahnen.

source: TEXT_HEAVNR204_02252_BIGGS_000_041<tab>I reckon that means we're in for a battle and a half when we get to the core. Still, there's naught those goblins can build that you can't break, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>─at least I hope there isn't! We'll soon see, I s'pose... Lead the way when you're ready. Me and Wedge will follow with Mide.
target: TEXT_HEAVNR204_02252_BIGGS_000_041<tab>Uns bleibt aber trotzdem nichts anderes übrig, als einen Angriff auf den zweiten Kern zu starten. Wir rücken mit voller Kampfstärke aus!

source: TEXT_HEAVNR204_02252_WEDGE_000_050<tab>I cannot bear to think what the Illuminati might be doing to Roundrox... But as long as Mide has the final codex fragment, she shouldn't be in any <var 1A 02 /var>real<var 1A 01 /var> danger...should she?
target: TEXT_HEAVNR204_02252_WEDGE_000_050<tab>Wenn wir Rundblox nur schnell da rausholen können! Immerhin hat Mide noch den Enigma-Kodex. Solange die Indigohand den nicht in die Finger bekommt, ist alles im grünen Bereich.

source: TEXT_HEAVNR204_02252_WEDGE_000_051<tab>I expect the Illuminati will have seen through Mide's ruse by now. But if they dare to try and take the real codex fragment, I will─ I will─ I will jolly well <var 1A 02 /var>stop them<var 1A 01 /var>, one way or another!
target: TEXT_HEAVNR204_02252_WEDGE_000_051<tab>Bestimmt haben sie jetzt schon spitzgekriegt, dass ihnen Mide den falschen Stein untergejubelt hat. Aber wenn sie kommen, um sich den echten zu holen, dann werden wir ihnen schon zeigen, was 'ne Harke ist!

source: TEXT_HEAVNR204_02252_MIDE_000_060<tab>Our path is clear. We shatter the Illuminati's last lines of defense, and disable the core housed within Midas.
target: TEXT_HEAVNR204_02252_MIDE_000_060<tab>Mein Entschluss steht fest. Bringen wir den zweiten Kern zum Stillstand.

source: TEXT_HEAVNR204_02252_MIDE_000_061<tab>In the depths of my despair, with the loss of my friends still fresh in my mind, I would have given anything to take back what we had done. Even if it meant my own life.
target: TEXT_HEAVNR204_02252_MIDE_000_061<tab>Ich hätte mein Leben, meine Seele gegeben, nur um diesen entsetzlichen Moment ungeschehen zu machen, in dem ich alles verlor.

source: TEXT_HEAVNR204_02252_MIDE_000_062<tab>But the world does not work like that. And even if it did, it is not what my beloved would have wanted.
target: TEXT_HEAVNR204_02252_MIDE_000_062<tab>Aber es ist geschehen und nichts kann <var 1A 02 /var>ihn<var 1A 01 /var> zurückbringen. Ich darf bei all meiner Trauer nicht zulassen, dass andere ihr Leben verlieren ...

source: TEXT_HEAVNR204_02252_BIGGS_000_800<tab>The second core, I do believe! Once that's out of commission, Alexander won't be going anywhere!
target: TEXT_HEAVNR204_02252_BIGGS_000_800<tab>Das also ist der Kern von Midas. Lasst uns gleich ans Werk gehen.

source: TEXT_HEAVNR204_02252_MIDE_000_801<tab>Dayan... Would that I could see you just once more...
target: TEXT_HEAVNR204_02252_MIDE_000_801<tab>Dayan ... Wenn ich dich nur einmal noch hätte sehen können ...

source: TEXT_HEAVNR204_02252_WEDGE_000_804<tab>Too frightened to face us alone, I see! Not that I blame you! We all know what <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> did to you last time!
target: TEXT_HEAVNR204_02252_WEDGE_000_804<tab>Mann! Ist der hartnäckig! Dabei hat er noch jedes Mal Prügel kassiert!

source: TEXT_HEAVNR204_02252_QUICKTHINXALLTHOUGHTS_000_805<tab>Pshhhkohhh... To usher in future that has been writ, even strongest gobbie must sometimes pretend to be weak, and let enemies win.
target: TEXT_HEAVNR204_02252_QUICKTHINXALLTHOUGHTS_000_805<tab>Psshh ... Für langbestimmte Schicksal muzzu eben manchmal scheintäuschen wie Verlierer ... war alles nur schlaue Inszenierensache, kho kho kho!

source: TEXT_HEAVNR204_02252_BIGGS_000_806<tab>Ohhh...<var 1A 02 /var>pretending<var 1A 01 /var>, were you!? And I s'pose losing this core was all part of your plan! Don't make me laugh! You know as much about the future as we do!
target: TEXT_HEAVNR204_02252_BIGGS_000_806<tab>Tu nicht so, als ob du alles geplant hättest! Schlechte Verlierer kann ich gar nicht ab!

source: TEXT_HEAVNR204_02252_QUICKTHINXALLTHOUGHTS_000_807<tab>Quickthinx knows all. For example, Quickthinx knows one among uplanders carries true fragment of <var 1A 02 /var>Enigma Codex<var 1A 01 /var>.
target: TEXT_HEAVNR204_02252_QUICKTHINXALLTHOUGHTS_000_807<tab>Kannzu ruhig reden, einfältige Pinsel. Denkfix weiß nämlich auch, dass Großwachsene schöne Schenk mitbracht haben ... und diesmal ist richtige, echte Glänzenstein!

source:
TEXT_HEAVNR204_02252_WEDGE_000_808<tab>It seems the game is up, Biggs. There's no hiding the truth from Quickthinx!
Very well, I admit it: <var 1A 02 /var>I<var 1A 01 /var> have the fragment. But I won't be handing it over to the likes of you!
target: TEXT_HEAVNR204_02252_WEDGE_000_808<tab>Genau, du größenwahnsinniger Blechzwerg! Wenn du's genau wissen willst: Ich hab den Kodex! Hol ihn dir doch, wenn du dich traust! Geschenkt gibt's nämlich nichts!

source: TEXT_HEAVNR204_02252_BIGGS_000_809<tab>Oi, Wedge, didn't you hear him? He knows <var 1A 02 /var>all<var 1A 01 /var>!

TEXT_HEAVNR204_02252_BIGGS_000_810<tab>...Which means he knows that what you're carrying's a worthless rock, while <var 1A 02 /var>I've<var 1A 01 /var> got the genuine article tucked away in me smallclothes!
target: TEXT_HEAVNR204_02252_BIGGS_000_810<tab>Huhu, Freunde! In Wirklichkeit habe <var 1A 02 /var>ich<var 1A 01 /var> den Kodex! Hier ist er, bei mi-hir!

source: TEXT_HEAVNR204_02252_QUICKTHINXALLTHOUGHTS_000_811<tab>Pshhhkohhh... Quickthinx already knows conclusion of uplanders' childish games.
target: TEXT_HEAVNR204_02252_QUICKTHINXALLTHOUGHTS_000_811<tab>Kho kho ... Denkfix muss zugeben, hazzu zwar Talent mit lustige Unterhalten, aber brauchzzu gar nicht bemühengeben. Denkfix weiß genau, wo ist!

source: TEXT_HEAVNR204_02252_QUICKTHINXALLTHOUGHTS_000_814<tab>Long ago was outcome decided. Uplanders think they are victorious, but luck is no friend to them today.
target: TEXT_HEAVNR204_02252_QUICKTHINXALLTHOUGHTS_000_814<tab>Lauf von Dinge ist schon lange vorherbestimmen. Kommt zuerst Täuschenversuch von Armleuchter ... dann als Nächsteschritt ... passiert kleine Panne mit Schwerefolge ...

source: TEXT_HEAVNR204_02252_QUICKTHINXALLTHOUGHTS_200_814<tab>And now <var 1A 02 /var>Enigma Codex<var 1A 01 /var> belongs to Illuminati. All pieces fall into our hands.
target: TEXT_HEAVNR204_02252_QUICKTHINXALLTHOUGHTS_200_814<tab>Und schon fällt letzte Trumpf in Indigohand ... wie Schenk von Himmel! Psh!

source: TEXT_HEAVNR204_02252_BIGGS_300_814<tab>Far as I can make out, the thing's in good working order. No damage, no signs of tampering... I can only think it was an energy fluctuation that did it. Just bad luck.
target: TEXT_HEAVNR204_02252_BIGGS_300_814<tab>Ich sehe nicht, wie er das Gerät manipuliert haben könnte ... Die Plattform hatte einfach kurz keine Energie mehr und sackte ab.

source: TEXT_HEAVNR204_02252_WEDGE_000_815<tab><var 1A 02 /var>Bad luck<var 1A 01 /var>!? You're saying it was pure chance that the platform stopped at that exact moment? Then what about Quickthinx? There is no <var 1A 02 /var>way<var 1A 01 /var> he could have predicted something like that! The odds would be infinitesimal!
target: TEXT_HEAVNR204_02252_WEDGE_000_815<tab>Aber das kann doch kein Zufall gewesen sein! Dass das genau in diesem Augenblick passiert!

source: TEXT_HEAVNR204_02252_WEDGE_000_816<tab>Well...however he did it, the fact remains that he <var 1A 02 /var>did<var 1A 01 /var>. B-But that doesn't mean we have to stand for it! When someone takes something from you, you just have to take it back!
target: TEXT_HEAVNR204_02252_WEDGE_000_816<tab>Kopf hoch, Leute! Ist doch halb so wild - wir holen uns das Teil schon wieder zurück!

source: TEXT_HEAVNR204_02252_BIGGS_000_850<tab>What a bunch of bleedin' dolts! Why didn't we just leave the fragment here with Backrix!?
target: TEXT_HEAVNR204_02252_BIGGS_000_850<tab>Verflixt ... Wir hätten den Enigma-Kodex nie mitnehmen dürfen. Wenn wir ihn beim Chef deponiert hätten, wär alles anders gekommen.

source: TEXT_HEAVNR204_02252_BIGGS_000_851<tab>Still, we did do <var 1A 02 /var>one<var 1A 01 /var> thing right, I s'pose. The second core's out of action, and that primal's going nowhere.
target: TEXT_HEAVNR204_02252_BIGGS_000_851<tab>Dank dir haben wir immerhin den zweiten Kern deaktiviert. Und jetzt kennen wir so gut wie jeden Winkel in dem Koloss.

source: TEXT_HEAVNR204_02252_WEDGE_000_860<tab>Try as I might, I cannot think of a logical explanation for what happened back there.
target: TEXT_HEAVNR204_02252_WEDGE_000_860<tab>Sag mal, wie siehst du das alles? Mir will einfach nicht in den Kopf, wie dieser Denkfix das gemacht hat.

source: TEXT_HEAVNR204_02252_WEDGE_000_861<tab>Not only did the platforms malfunction at precisely the right moment, but Quickthinx was on the <var 1A 02 /var>only<var 1A 01 /var> one that didn't. And it just happened to be in <var 1A 02 /var>exactly<var 1A 01 /var> the right place to catch the codex fragment. Do you know how difficult it would be to orchestrate something like that, much less <var 1A 02 /var>predict it<var 1A 01 /var>!?
target: TEXT_HEAVNR204_02252_WEDGE_000_861<tab>Ich meine, kann er wirklich vorhergesehen haben, dass Mides Plattform einen Aussetzer haben würde? Er ist jedenfalls zielsicher zu genau der Stelle gefahren, wo der Kodex hinfallen würde. Und auf unser Täuschungsmanöver ist er auch nicht eingestiegen.

source: TEXT_HEAVNR204_02252_MIDE_000_870<tab>...Forgive me. Through my incompetence, the Illuminati have all they need to control Alexander. And though the beast is now immobile, I cannot help but feel that matters are worse.
target: TEXT_HEAVNR204_02252_MIDE_000_870<tab>Es tut mir leid. Wegen mir hat Denkfix nun den Kodex. Ein Glück, dass ich den zweiten Kern rechtzeitig abschalten konnte, sonst hätte die Indigohand jetzt völlig freie Bahn.

source: TEXT_HEAVNR204_02252_MIDE_000_871<tab>...Nor do our troubles end there. In our absence, Backrix seems to have taken leave of his senses...
target: TEXT_HEAVNR204_02252_MIDE_000_871<tab>Aber eines kommt mir seltsam vor ... Rückblix scheint plötzlich Gedächtnisprobleme zu haben.

source: TEXT_HEAVNR204_02252_BACKRIX_000_900<tab>Pssshkoh... Do uplanders forget something? Matters are too urgent for such foolish doings!
target: TEXT_HEAVNR204_02252_BACKRIX_000_900<tab>Psh? Warum bizzu hier? Hazzu was vergessen oder warum sind Großwachsene nicht in Koloss?

source: TEXT_HEAVNR204_02252_BACKRIX_000_901<tab>...<var 1A 02 /var>What<var 1A 01 /var>? Tongueflaps of uplander make Backrix almost to laugh. Uplander claims already to have stopped core and lost fragment to Quickthinx? Pssshkoh... Look here, uplander: Backrix has braincase like steel trap─catching all heard things, all seen things─and he saw uplanders leave but few moments ago.
target: TEXT_HEAVNR204_02252_BACKRIX_000_901<tab>Pssshhh?! Kern ist schon stillstehen, aber Denkfix hat Glänzenstein diebstehlen?! Hörzzu jetzt aber auf mit Scherzsprechen!
TEXT_HEAVNR204_02252_BACKRIX_000_902<tab>In Erinnern von Rückblix bizzu doch grad erst reingehen in Koloss!
TEXT_HEAVNR204_02252_Q1_000_960<tab>Willst du den Midischen Knoten wirklich verlassen?
